name: PieGuy
0:
”Alexa, ask PieGuy to find me some apple pie recipes.”
”Alexa, ask PieGuy to list the ingredients in Perfect Apple Pie.”
”Alexa, ask PieGuy for step number three in Bourbon Pecan Pie.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pie guy
des:
PieGuy is an interactive consultant for making and baking pies. Whether during the holidays or just hungry days, PieGuy can help you choose a recipe from different types of pies and list the ingredients and steps necessary to get your kitchen smelling marvelous in no time.

Recipes are added after being vetted by senior pie consultant / cloud architect / PieGuy creator AppleBaggins.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
